name: ARDrone Sim: Zombies
description:
Please Note: ARDrone Sim: Zombies requires iPad 2 or newer, iPhone 4S / 5, iPod Touch 5

ARDrone Sim: Zombies is the follow up to the popular ARDrone Sim quadcopter Simulator.

Take on hoards of the undead with your AR.Drone radio controlled quadcopter, collect ammo, run missions, save money to buy customisations and aim for the highest score in the world.
